00047 /* ************************************* */
00048 /* AnimData API */
00049 
00050 /* Check if the given ID-block can have AnimData */
00051 short id_type_can_have_animdata(struct ID *id);
00052 
00053 /* Get AnimData from the given ID-block */
00054 struct AnimData *BKE_animdata_from_id(struct ID *id);
00055 
00056 /* Add AnimData to the given ID-block */
00057 struct AnimData *BKE_id_add_animdata(struct ID *id);
00058 
00059 /* Set active action used by AnimData from the given ID-block */
00060 short BKE_animdata_set_action(struct ReportList *reports, struct ID *id, struct bAction *act);
00061 
00062 /* Free AnimData */
00063 void BKE_free_animdata(struct ID *id);
00064 
00065 /* Copy AnimData */
00066 struct AnimData *BKE_copy_animdata(struct AnimData *adt, const short do_action);
00067 
00068 /* Copy AnimData */
00069 int BKE_copy_animdata_id(struct ID *id_to, struct ID *id_from, const short do_action);
00070 
00071 /* Copy AnimData Actions */
00072 void BKE_copy_animdata_id_action(struct ID *id);
00073 
00074 /* Make Local */
00075 void BKE_animdata_make_local(struct AnimData *adt);
00076 
00077 /* Re-Assign ID's */
00078 void BKE_relink_animdata(struct AnimData *adt);

00080 /* ************************************* */
00081 /* KeyingSets API */
00082 
00083 /* Used to create a new 'custom' KeyingSet for the user, that will be automatically added to the stack */
00084 struct KeyingSet *BKE_keyingset_add(struct ListBase *list, const char idname[], const char name[], short flag, short keyingflag);
00085 
00086 /* Add a path to a KeyingSet */
00087 struct KS_Path *BKE_keyingset_add_path(struct KeyingSet *ks, struct ID *id, const char group_name[], const char rna_path[], int array_index, short flag, short groupmode);
00088 
00089 /* Find the destination matching the criteria given */
00090 struct KS_Path *BKE_keyingset_find_path(struct KeyingSet *ks, struct ID *id, const char group_name[], const char rna_path[], int array_index, int group_mode);
00091 
00092 /* Copy all KeyingSets in the given list */
00093 void BKE_keyingsets_copy(struct ListBase *newlist, struct ListBase *list);
00094 
00095 /* Free the given Keying Set path */
00096 void BKE_keyingset_free_path(struct KeyingSet *ks, struct KS_Path *ksp);
00097 
00098 /* Free data for KeyingSet but not set itself */
00099 void BKE_keyingset_free(struct KeyingSet *ks);
00100 
00101 /* Free all the KeyingSets in the given list */
00102 void BKE_keyingsets_free(struct ListBase *list);

00105 /* Path Fixing API */
00106 
00107 /* Fix all the paths for the given ID+AnimData */
00108 void BKE_animdata_fix_paths_rename(struct ID *owner_id, struct AnimData *adt, struct ID *ref_id, const char *prefix,
00109                                    const char *oldName, const char *newName, int oldSubscript, int newSubscript,
00110                                    int verify_paths);
00111 
00112 /* Fix all the paths for the entire database... */
00113 void BKE_all_animdata_fix_paths_rename(ID *ref_id, const char *prefix, const char *oldName, const char *newName);

00118 void BKE_animdata_separate_by_basepath(struct ID *srcID, struct ID *dstID, struct ListBase *basepaths);

00121 void action_move_fcurves_by_basepath(struct bAction *srcAct, struct bAction *dstAct, const char basepath[]);

00137 /* Evaluation API */

00139 /* ------------- Main API -------------------- */
00140 /* In general, these ones should be called to do all animation evaluation */
00141 
00142 /* Evaluation loop for evaluating animation data  */
00143 void BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(struct Scene *scene, struct ID *id, struct AnimData *adt, float ctime, short recalc);
00144 
00145 /* Evaluation of all ID-blocks with Animation Data blocks - Animation Data Only */
00146 void BKE_animsys_evaluate_all_animation(struct Main *main, struct Scene *scene, float ctime);

00148 
00149 /* ------------ Specialized API --------------- */
00150 /* There are a few special tools which require these following functions. They are NOT to be used
00151  * for standard animation evaluation UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES! 
00152  *
00153  * i.e. Pose Library (PoseLib) uses some of these for selectively applying poses, but 
00154  *      Particles/Sequencer performing funky time manipulation is not ok.
00155  */
00156 
00157 /* Evaluate Action (F-Curve Bag) */
00158 void animsys_evaluate_action(struct PointerRNA *ptr, struct bAction *act, struct AnimMapper *remap, float ctime);
00159 
00160 /* Evaluate Action Group */
00161 void animsys_evaluate_action_group(struct PointerRNA *ptr, struct bAction *act, struct bActionGroup *agrp, struct AnimMapper *remap, float ctime);
